text: enne! Ivarkalutaiya ullankalil etum noy irukkirata? Allatu (avaraip parri) ivarkal cantekikkinranara? Allatu allahvum avanutaiya tutarum ivarkalukku aniyayam ceytu vituvarkal enru payappatukinranara? (Avarkal aniti ceyyappatave mattarkal.) Maraka, ivarkaltan varampu mirum aniyayakkararkal avar. (Atalaltan ivvaru ceykinranar)
